text: You pick up the golden sparkle.
Rectangularly shaped, (Why is everything rectangular?), slightly glinting
under the sun. A barcode was visible but you're not a barcode scanner, are you?
You pull out the scanner. The electronic reader hummed as you swung it over the card.
"500 CREDITS FOR A MONTHLY STIPEND.” The device read out loud, "VALID UNTIL REVOKED.”
But as you were deep in thought, the tint of blue eyes glinted under the sunlight,
staring hungrily at the device in your hands.
Yet you notice nothing, instead deciding to go to the main road.
